titles.title: To remove a restriction on the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into agreements with other Federal agencies to acquire goods and services directly related to improving or utilizing firefighting capability of the Forest Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research.

bill.summary: 3/6/1997--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire fire fighting goods or services from Federal agencies without regard to certain commercial contracting requirements.
